definitions.definition: a single person or thing, especially when compared to the group or set to which they belong:
examples: Every individual has rights which must never be taken away.

definitions.definition: existing and considered separately from the other things or people in a group:
examples: Each individual table is finished by hand.

definitions.definition: given to or relating to a single, separate person or thing:
examples: We deal with each case on an individual basis.
